name: OCKPatientQuery
desc: A query that limits which patients the store returns, when you are fetching.

items.name: init(for: Date)
items.desc: Creates a new patient query with a specific date.

items.name: init(dateInterval: DateInterval)
items.desc: Creates a new patient query with a specific date interval.

items.name: init(OCKAnyPatientQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new patient query from a specific query.

items.name: var limit: Int?
items.desc: The maximum number of results the query returns.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval?
items.desc: A date interval for entities that match the query.

items.name: var groupIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: An array of group identifers that match the query.

items.name: var ids: [String]
items.desc: An array of unique identifiers that belong to the entities that match the query.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: An integer value that indicates how much to offset the query results, and which can be used to paginate results.

items.name: var remoteIDs: [String]
items.desc: An array of remote IDs for entities that match the query.

items.name: var tags: [String]
items.desc: An array of tags by which to limit the query results.

items.name: var versionIDs: [OCKLocalVersionID]
items.desc: An array of version identifiers by which to limit the query results.

items.name: var sortDescriptors: [OCKPatientSortDescriptor]
items.desc: The order in which you want to sort the query results.

items.name: enum OCKPatientSortDescriptor
items.desc: The values that indicate how you want to sort queried patients.
